column1: Please Note. You can't remove or create new options (except Image and HTML Text) for specific store view. That should be done in the Default configuration scope and then inherited to the store view scope. However, you still can hide some options by setting visibility = hidden. In the store view scope you can also rename options, reorder, set custom prices and change other properties.

In the store view scope you can also rename options, reorder, set custom prices and change other properties.
